param_1_desc: number of successes until experiment is stopped
param_2_throws_desc: must be a probability (i.e., a number on the interval [0,1])
repl_text_main_desc: Returns an array containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from a negative binomial distribution.
repl_text_assign_desc: Fills an array with pseudorandom numbers drawn from a negative binomial distribution.
repl_text_factory_desc: Returns a function for creating arrays containing pseudorandom numbers drawn from a negative binomial distribution.
repl_text_param_1_desc: Number of successes until experiment is stopped.
